items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India markets to open higher led by Wall Street gains, Chinese support
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian equity benchmark indices BSE Sensex and Nifty 50 were set for a positive open on Tuesday, led by record closing highs overnight on the Wall Street.

items.title: Market today: GIFT Nifty tops 26k, China rate cut, Northern Arc IPO listing
items.description: Share market today: GIFT Nifty futures breach the 26,000 level for the first time, Northern Arc, Arkade Developers and Western Carriers to list on NSE BSE

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Adani Power, Vodafone Idea, PNB, Reliance Power, V2 Retail
items.description: Stocks to watch today: Indian equity benchmark indices were headed for a strong open on Tuesday, led by record closing highs on the Wall Street by benchmark indices S&P 500 and the Dow.

items.title: Here's how to trade Nifty Financial Services, PSU Bank indices on Sept 24
items.description: The Nifty Financial Services Index has recently approached its resistance level of 25,000, which is a crucial round figure for short-term traders.

items.title: Dividend, bonus, stock-split: Bajaj Holdings, 7 others go ex-date tomorrow
items.description: Here is the list of stocks trading ex-date tomorrow due to dividend, amalgamation, bonus issue, and stock split

items.title: Strong content pipeline, asset light model to drive gains for PVR Inox
items.description: Most brokerages believe that the content pipeline in the December quarter will help the company surpass the performance in Q2FY24

items.title: Asia stocks rise to highest in 2.5 year on China's stimulus measures
items.description: China's central bank on Monday lowered its 14-day repo rate by 10 basis points, days after disappointing markets by not cutting longer-term rates

items.title: Firstsource Solutions shares gain 3% after arm buys Ascensos for GBP 42 mn
items.description: The surge in Firstsource Solutions share price came after the company announced that Firstsource Solutions UK Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the company, has acquired  Ascensos for 42 mn pounds

items.title: GR Infra shares climb 6% on emerging lowest bidder for project of Rs 904 cr
items.description: The uptick in the share price of GR Infraprojects came after the company announced that it has emerged as the lowest bidder (L-1) for a project worth Rs 903.534 crore from Maharashtra Metro Rail Corp.

items.title: Northern Arc Capital makes stellar debut, lists at 33% premium on BSE, NSE
items.description: Northern Arc Capital shares listed at Rs 351 on the BSE, reflecting a premium of 33.40 per cent against the issue price of Rs 263
